description: Burnley unveil new away kit for 2023-24
title: Burnley unveil new away kit
title_page: Burnley unveil new away kit for 2023-24 - BBC Sport
maintext:
Burnley have released their away kit for the 2023-24 season - and it's a take on an old favourite.
They say the "vibrant yellow design" revisits the 1994 strip but offers a "modern and clean vision for a new campaign in the Premier League".
The Clarets could get their first chance to sport their new look in their friendly against Benfica later (20:30 BST).
